channel.title: Full View
channel.desc: The show also features 30 minutes of market sense in-depth.

channel.name: SABC News ZA

channel.desc: It's Topical gives you a sense of the nation's mood. Digital, pacy, interactive and engaging journalism brought to the TV screen.

channel.desc: We focus on the sights and scenery and celebrate experiences and locations in South Africa, Africa and abroad.
